    Methods in org.apache.drill.exec.store that return ConnectorHandle
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ConnectorHandle
    ConnectorHandle.configuredConnector(ConnectorLocator locator, Class<? extends StoragePluginConfig> configClass)
    Construct a handle for a "normal" connector which takes a plugin config and constructs a plugin instance based on that config.
    static ConnectorHandle
    ConnectorHandle.intrinsicConnector(ConnectorLocator locator, StoragePlugin plugin)
    Construct a handle for an intrinsic (system) connector which always uses a single config: the one created along with the plugin instance itself.
